name: Slime Slime
description:
Cute puzzle game with slimes. E to fuse with other slime and Q to split.

Made for GMTK GameJam 2021

Team:

Lina - programmer/game design/leader - Lina Hale#8729

xami - programmer/game design - xami#1713

crisrock - music - crisrock#2064

lyckstolp - sound designer - Lyckstolp#3858

onni - art - Onni#5113
